name: CommunityModeration

methods.name: addFlagToComment
methods.signature: public static ConnectApi.ModerationFlags addFlagToComment(String communityId, String commentId)
methods.description: Add a moderation flag to a comment.

params.name: commentId
params.description: Use either the ID for a community, internal, or null. The ID for a comment.

methods.name: addFlagToComment
methods.signature: public static ConnectApi.ModerationFlags addFlagToComment(String communityId, String commentId, ConnectApi.CommunityFlagVisibility visibility)
methods.description: Add a moderation flag of the specified visibility to a comment.

params.name: visibility
params.description: Use either the ID for a community, internal, or null. The ID for a comment. Visibility behavior of a flag for various user types.  ModeratorsOnly—The flag is visible only to users with moderation permissions on the flagged element or item.   SelfAndModerators—The flag is visible to the creator of the flag and to users with moderation permissions on the flagged element or item.

methods.name: addFlagToComment
methods.signature: public static ConnectApi.ModerationFlags addFlagToComment(String communityId, String commentId, ConnectApi.CommunityFlagType type)
methods.description: Add a moderation flag of the specified type to a comment.

params.name: type
params.description: Use either the ID for a community, internal, or null. The ID for a comment. Type of moderation flag.  FlagAsInappropriate—Flag for inappropriate content.   FlagAsSpam—Flag for spam.   If a type isn’t specified, it defaults to FlagAsInappropriate.

methods.name: addFlagToComment
methods.signature: public static ConnectApi.ModerationFlags addFlagToComment(String communityId, String commentId, String note)
methods.description: Add a moderation flag with a note to a comment.

params.name: note
params.description: Use either the ID for a community, internal, or null. The ID for a comment. A note of up to 4,000 characters about the flag.

methods.name: addFlagToComment
methods.signature: public static ConnectApi.ModerationFlags addFlagToComment(String communityId, String commentId, ConnectApi.CommunityFlagType type, String note)
methods.description: Add a moderation flag of the specified type with a note to a comment.

params.name: note
params.description: Use either the ID for a community, internal, or null. The ID for a comment. Type of moderation flag.  FlagAsInappropriate—Flag for inappropriate content.   FlagAsSpam—Flag for spam.   If a type isn’t specified, it defaults to FlagAsInappropriate.  A note of up to 4,000 characters about the flag.

methods.name: addFlagToComment
methods.signature: public static ConnectApi.ModerationFlags addFlagToComment(String communityId, String commentId, ConnectApi.CommunityFlagType type, ConnectApi.CommunityFlagVisibility visibility)
methods.description: Add a moderation flag of the specified type and visibility to a comment.

params.name: visibility
params.description: Use either the ID for a community, internal, or null. The ID for a comment. Type of moderation flag.  FlagAsInappropriate—Flag for inappropriate content.   FlagAsSpam—Flag for spam.   If a type isn’t specified, it defaults to FlagAsInappropriate.  Visibility behavior of a flag for various user types.  ModeratorsOnly—The flag is visible only to users with moderation permissions on the flagged element or item.   SelfAndModerators—The flag is visible to the creator of the flag and to users with moderation permissions on the flagged element or item.

methods.name: addFlagToComment
methods.signature: public static ConnectApi.ModerationFlags addFlagToComment(String communityId, String commentId, ConnectApi.CommunityFlagVisibility visibility, String note)
methods.description: Add a moderation flag of the specified visibility with a note to a comment.

params.name: note
params.description: Use either the ID for a community, internal, or null. The ID for a comment. Visibility behavior of a flag for various user types.  ModeratorsOnly—The flag is visible only to users with moderation permissions on the flagged element or item.   SelfAndModerators—The flag is visible to the creator of the flag and to users with moderation permissions on the flagged element or item.    A note of up to 4,000 characters about the flag.

methods.signature: public static ConnectApi.ModerationFlags getFlagsOnComment(String communityId, String commentId)
methods.description: Get the moderation flags on a comment.

params.name: commentId
params.description: Use either the ID for a community, internal, or null. The ID for a comment.

methods.name: getFlagsOnComment
methods.signature: public static ConnectApi.ModerationFlags getFlagsOnComment(String communityId, String commentId, ConnectApi.CommunityFlagVisibility visibility)
methods.description: Get the moderation flags with specified visibility on a comment.

params.name: visibility
params.description: Use either the ID for a community, internal, or null. The ID for a comment. Visibility behavior of a flag for various user types.  ModeratorsOnly—The flag is visible only to users with moderation permissions on the flagged element or item.   SelfAndModerators—The flag is visible to the creator of the flag and to users with moderation permissions on the flagged element or item.

methods.name: getFlagsOnComment
methods.signature: public static ConnectApi.ModerationFlags getFlagsOnComment(String communityId, String commentId, Integer pageSize, String pageParam)
methods.description: Get a page of moderation flags on a comment.

params.name: pageParam
params.description: Use either the ID for a community, internal, or null. The ID for a comment. Specifies the number of items per page. Valid values are from 1 through 100. The default size is 0. The page token to use to view the page. Page tokens are returned as part of the response class, for example, currentPageToken or nextPageToken. If you pass in null, the first page is returned.

methods.name: getFlagsOnComment
methods.signature: public static ConnectApi.ModerationFlags getFlagsOnComment(String communityId, String commentId, ConnectApi.CommunityFlagVisibility visibility, Integer pageSize, String pageParam)
methods.description: Get a page of moderation flags with specified visibility on a comment.

params.name: pageParam
params.description: Use either the ID for a community, internal, or null. The ID for a comment. Visibility behavior of a flag for various user types.  ModeratorsOnly—The flag is visible only to users with moderation permissions on the flagged element or item.   SelfAndModerators—The flag is visible to the creator of the flag and to users with moderation permissions on the flagged element or item.    Specifies the number of items per page. Valid values are from 1 through 100. The default size is 0. The page token to use to view the page. Page tokens are returned as part of the response class, for example, currentPageToken or nextPageToken. If you pass in null, the first page is returned.

methods.name: removeFlagFromComment
methods.signature: public static ConnectApi.ModerationFlags removeFlagFromComment(String communityId, String commentId, String userId)
methods.description: Remove a moderation flag from a comment.

params.name: userId
params.description: Use either the ID for a community, internal, or null. The ID for a comment. The ID for a user.

methods.name: removeFlagsOnFeedItem

params.name: userId

description: Access information about flagged feed items and comments in a community. Add and remove flags from comments and feed items.
